messages.id: You have estimated that there are {Estimation} civilizations in the Milky Way.
messages.message: You have estimated that there are {Estimation} civilizations in the Milky Way.

=1.msg: Você estimou que há 1 civilização na Via Láctea.

other.msg: Você estimou que há {Estimation} civilizações na Via Láctea.

messages.id: This is a difference of {Difference} orders of magnitude from your initial prediction of {Prediction}.
messages.message: This is a difference of {Difference} orders of magnitude from your initial prediction of {Prediction}.

=1.msg: Há uma differença de 1 ordem de magnitude a partir da sua predição inicial de {Prediction}.

other.msg: Há uma differença de {Difference} ordens de magnitude a partir da sua predição inicial de {Prediction}.

messages.id: How many technological advanced civilizations exist in the Milky Way?
messages.message: How many technological advanced civilizations exist in the Milky Way?
messages.translation: Quantas civilizações tecnologicamente avançadas existem na Via Láctea?

messages.id: Only us, we are all alone
messages.message: Only us, we are all alone

messages.id: About how many stars are there in our galaxy?
messages.message: About how many stars are there in our galaxy?
messages.translation: Quantas estrelas existem em nossa galáxia?

messages.id: Approximately what percentage of the stars in our galaxy have planets in orbit?
messages.message: Approximately what percentage of the stars in our galaxy have planets in orbit?
messages.translation: Aproximadamente qual é a porcentagem de estrelas em nossa galáxia que têm planetas em órbita?

messages.id: Very few stars have planets in orbit
messages.message: Very few stars have planets in orbit
messages.translation: Muito poucas estrelas têm planetas em órbita

messages.id: On average, how many habitable (Earth-like) planets are there per planetary system?
messages.message: On average, how many habitable (Earth-like) planets are there per planetary system?
messages.translation: Na média, quantos planetas habitáveis (parecidos com a Terra) existem por sistema planetário?

messages.id: Very few (not even one in every solar system)
messages.message: Very few (not even one in every solar system)
messages.translation: Muito poucos (menos de um por sistema solar)

messages.id: On what fraction of habitable planets will life develop?
messages.message: On what fraction of habitable planets will life develop?
messages.translation: Qual a fração de planetas habitáveis que a vida irá se desenvolver?

messages.id: A very small percentage, life is very rare
messages.message: A very small percentage, life is very rare
messages.translation: Uma pequena porcentagem, a vida é muito rara

messages.id: 100%%, if conditions are favorable, life is inevitable
messages.message: 100%%, if conditions are favorable, life is inevitable
messages.translation: 100%%, se as condições forem favoráveis, a vida é inevitável

messages.id: On what fraction of planets on which life develops will life evolve to intelligence?
messages.message: On what fraction of planets on which life develops will life evolve to intelligence?
messages.translation: Qual a fração de planetas com vida na qual vida inteligente irá evoluir?

messages.id: What fraction of planets on which life evolves to intelligence will the intelligence develop a technological civilization capable of radio communication?
messages.message: What fraction of planets on which life evolves to intelligence will the intelligence develop a technological civilization capable of radio communication?
messages.translation: Qual a fração de planetas com vida inteligente que irá desenvolver uma civilização tecnologicamente capaz de se comunicar por rádio?

messages.id: 100%%, a technological civilization will always eventually develop if life is present
messages.message: 100%%, a technological civilization will always eventually develop if life is present
messages.translation: 100%%, uma civilização tecnologicamente capaz sempre se desenvolverá se houver vida

messages.id: What is the average lifetime of a technological civilization capable of communication?
messages.message: What is the average lifetime of a technological civilization capable of communication?
messages.translation: Qual é o tempo de vida médio de uma civilização tecnologicamente capaz de comunicação?

messages.id: Do you agree with your most recent estimation?
messages.message: Do you agree with your most recent estimation?
messages.translation: Você concoda com essa estimativa mais recente?

messages.id: Yes, I am more confident using the Drake Equation calculation
messages.message: Yes, I am more confident using the Drake Equation calculation
messages.translation: Sim, eu estou mais confiante usando o cálculo da Equação de Drake

messages.id: Yes, the Drake Equation includes factors I didn't think during my initial prediction
messages.message: Yes, the Drake Equation includes factors I didn't think during my initial prediction
messages.translation: Sim, a Equação de Drake inclui fatores que eu não pensei durante minha predição inicial

messages.id: No, I am more confident with my initial prediction
messages.message: No, I am more confident with my initial prediction
messages.translation: Não, eu estou mais confiante no minha predição inicial

messages.id: No, any guess is good as mine
messages.message: No, any guess is good as mine
messages.translation: Não, qualquer predição é tão boa quanto a minha

messages.id: This project was created as part of the course, Principles and Practices in Science Education, at the University of Toronto with the intention of being a free resource for educators to introduce the Drake Equation to a wider audience.
messages.message: This project was created as part of the course, Principles and Practices in Science Education, at the University of Toronto with the intention of being a free resource for educators to introduce the Drake Equation to a wider audience.
messages.translation: Esse projeto foi criado como parte do curso Princípios e Práticas em Ciência da Educação, na Unversidade de Toronto, com a intenção de ser um recurso gratuito a educadores para introduzir a Equação de Drake para uma ampla audiência.

messages.id: The questions for the Drake Equation on the survey are from LoPresto and Hubble-Zdanowski (2012). The code is open-source using the MIT License.
messages.message: The questions for the Drake Equation on the survey are from LoPresto and Hubble-Zdanowski (2012). The code is open-source using the MIT License.
messages.translation: As questões para a Equação de Drake na pesquisa são de LoPresto and Hubble-Zdanowski (2012). O código é aberto usando a Licença MIT.

messages.id: If you would like to contribute to the project, for example, adding more translations, get in touch:
messages.message: If you would like to contribute to the project, for example, adding more translations, get in touch:
messages.translation: Se você quiser contribuir com o projeto, por exemplo, adicionando mais traduções, entre em contato:

messages.id: Are we alone in the Universe?
messages.message: Are we alone in the Universe?

messages.id: Estimate the number of detectable alien civilizations in the Milky Way using the Drake Equation.
messages.message: Estimate the number of detectable alien civilizations in the Milky Way using the Drake Equation.
messages.translation: Estime o número de civilizações alienígenas detectáveis na Via Láctea usando a Equação de Drake.

messages.id: to think about the size and composition of the galaxy and how it affects the possibility of intelligent life
messages.message: to think about the size and composition of the galaxy and how it affects the possibility of intelligent life
messages.translation: pensar sobre o tamanho e composição da galaxia e como afeta a possibilidade de vida inteligente

messages.id: to understand and estimate the terms of the Drake Equation
messages.message: to understand and estimate the terms of the Drake Equation
messages.translation: entender e estimar os termos da Equação de Drake

messages.id: to compare your initial guess with the final value
messages.message: to compare your initial guess with the final value
messages.translation: comparar sua predição inicial com o valor final

messages.id: Select the choice that best agrees with what you think.
messages.message: Select the choice that best agrees with what you think.
messages.translation: Selecione a opção que melhor concorde com o que você pensa.
